entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early this evening and ending overnight then 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
